body:
Ok now let me explain myself.
A few weeks ago this guy called Slicorn, Sliporn and I just thought it was funny so every time I see Slicorn I get reminded of Sliporn. Well today I saw him and the conversation went something like this:
Me: Lol everytime I see Slicorn I get reminded of Sliporn
Glitchy:UR_NOT_WORTH_IT
Me: but I didn't call him that it was someone else lol
Glitchy: Still, don't use that language
and before I even said "ok sorry",
I got banned for the whole day...

Now staff, you can block it whatever but I just wanted to express my opinion about this that at least give people a second chance I mean people say worst stuff that porn all the time and you don't ban them.
Thank you for reading
